Title: Grants recognized veterans' organization free use of pavilions
Summary: Grants recognized veterans' organizations free use of pavilions at state parks, other state recreational facilities, and historic sites.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add ยง13.33, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to waiving pavilion rental fees for recognized veterans' organizations
